summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 49, Mount Baker Park Addition by grading and paving with asphalt laid upon a concrete foundation, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 51120 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
